  <PollOptionList>
    {options.map((option) => (
      <PollOptionItem
        key={option.id}
        label={option.label}
        count={option.count}
        isSelected={option.userVotedForOption}
        onVote={() => {
          submitVote(option.id);
        }}
        onUnvote={() => {

        }}
      />
    ))}
  </PollOptionList>
</Poll>
